Okay, the user is asking for healthy dinner ideas. Let me think about what they might really need. They probably want options that are easy to make, not too complicated, since dinner prep can be time-consuming. Maybe they're busy or short on time. 

Hmm, they didn't specify dietary restrictions, so I should cover a range of options without assuming allergies or preferences. But I should mention that they can adjust based on their needs. 

I recall that healthy meals usually focus on whole foods
